QuestData.Title: WANTED: Arcatraz Sentinels
QuestData.Description: The sentinels within the Arcatraz have gone haywire. The prisoners run rampant and the guards attack those that would help.$B$BMah'duun hears the speaker on the nether winds. The speaker says to destroy the sentinels.$B$BAccomplish this and today's bounty is yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nether-Stalker Mah'duun wants you to dismantle 5 Arcatraz Sentinels. Return to him in Shattrath's Lower City once that has been accomplished in order to collect the bounty.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you not know how to get to Tempest Keep and the Arcatraz? East through the Netherstorm and then fly or fall, the choice is yours.
QuestData.RewardText: With the sentinels destroyed, perhaps the naaru will ask the Consortium to replace them? Mah'duun does not know and does not care.$B$BYou have earned the bounty.$B$BReturn again tomorrow and the winds will have whispered once more to Mah'duun.
